WelcomeScreen.PasswordMessage: Write the password of the app version you want to switch to

Tour.Warning: You are currently in the middle of a recipe. Please finish it before restarting the tour.
Tour.WelcomeScreenContent: This is the welcome screen. This is what you'll be using to navigate around the app.
Tour.StartCookingContent: Click here to go to app and start cooking!
Tour.AboutUsContent: Click here to learn more about us!
Tour.ToggleDarkModeContent: Click here to toggle dark mode!
Tour.SwitchToSentenceModeContent: Click here to mark the changes in sentence scale! Don't worry, this will be explained more in detail later!
Tour.ChangeAppVersionContent: We have several variants of the app, you can switch between them here! (You require the password for each version)
Tour.RestartTourContent: You can always restart the tour by clicking here!

ResultPage.End: Great, you're all done! Thank you. You'll be redirected to the homepage

MainPage.TitleImproveRecipe: Your improved recipe will be here!
MainPage.ContentWordScale: You will be asked to find out the changes either in word-scale or sentence-scale(Remember you can always switch the scale from the menu!)
MainPage.ContentHighlightedChanges: The changes will already be highlighted for you!
MainPage.ContentCheckAppVersion: You can check the current variant/version of the app you are using, by clicking here. It should be right now {appVersion}
MainPage.ContentRevealChangesOne: Click here to reveal one of the changes!
MainPage.ContentRevealChangesAll: Click here to reveal all of the changes!

RecipeForm.Warning: Note this might result in a significant deviation from the original recipe.

guider.step1Description: Write your recipe! And click submit to get a new recipe!
guider.step2Description: We are cooking your improved recipe! Please wait!
guider.step3Description: Your new recipe is here! Click on the words you think are new!
